      Subclasses of PhysicalBody in crazyballrun.game.physics.bodies 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SoftBody
      The SoftBody implements the rigid body.
      class  Vehicle
      The Vehicle class extens the RigidBody class by specifying collision and collision reactions as well as implementing explicit euler integration method for updating position, velocity and rotation of the vehicle.
